biography: Lasse, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his contemplative approach to the game. Representing Tapiola Golf, Lasse's presence is always felt, even if his emotions are not readily visible.

With seven past appearances in the Hector Trophée, Lasse's experience is undeniable. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication to the sport remains unwavering. Spectators can look forward to his eighth appearance in Hector Trophée 2025.
Off the course, Lasse is known for his quiet intensity and his love for the strategic elements of golf. He's a formidable competitor who brings a calculated and thoughtful approach to the game.
